metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15824 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: In JetBrains Kotlin from 1.4-M1 to 1.4-RC (as Kotlin 1.3.7x is not affectedby the issue. Fixed version is 1.4.0) there is a script-cache privilegeescalation vulnerability due to kotlin-main-kts cached scripts in thesystem temp directory, which is shared by all users by default.

criterions.comment: kotlin package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
